Model

Class MusicOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.LoadingMediaPlay
      • Model.MusicOperation

  • public class MusicOperation
extends LoadingMediaPlay
    This class provides the functions to play a music. These methods should have been implemented in the Music class, but since the Playable interface was created at a late time, there was not enough time to implement this and restructure the whole Controller class.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void next()
      This next function is used to select the next music on relative to the current playing music
      void pause()
      This is the pause function for a currently playing music
      void play(Music selectedMusic)
      This play method starts the music by playing the associated media player.
      void stop()
      Stops the currently playing music
